about_the_game:
Welcome to Leaf Clicker: Grow Your Green Thumb!


Embark on a serene journey of growth and creativity in Leaf Clicker, where your leaf expands with every click! Start with a simple patch of land and transform it into a lush and vibrant paradise. Unlock 19 unique gardening items, each enhancing your leaf's beauty and efficiency. From the humble Watering Can to the industrious Bee, every item brings something special to the landscape.

Features:


  • 19 Gardening Essentials: Equip items like Shovels, Fertilizer, Garden Gnomes, and a revolutionary Sun Lamp.
  • Upgrade Your Tools: Enhance your gardening skills by upgrading your tools. More power means faster growth!

Whether you're a green thumb enthusiast or a casual clicker gamer, Leaf Clicker offers endless hours of tranquil and engaging gameplay. Grow your leaf, unlock upgrades, and discover the joys of gardening without even getting your hands dirty!

*Translations were made by ChatGPT, let us know if something is wrong or does not make sense to be possible to fix as soon as possible.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and later
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 240 MB available space

short_description: Grow Your Green Thumb! Click the leaf to earn crops, then use them to buy tools and upgrade them. Each tool boosts your crop yield, turning your leaf into a lush paradise. Start clicking and watch your leaf flourish!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Hindi*
*languages with full audio support
